139.heading: Detweiler.
139.title: "Cody Starbuck"
139.author: by Howard Chaykin
139.appears_in: p. 82-89 in Heavy Metal, v. 5, no. 4 (July 1981).
notes: "When last we read, Cody and Porfirio had set out to meet with Lady Tessa in order to sell her a clonedroid labor force for Detweiler. When the three of them met, she furiously ordered that Cody and Porfirio be imprisoned, tried, and executed for no apparent reason."
"To be continued."
